attributes.background:
The Brexit Leave campaign has been found to have lied, manipulated the vote, & broken the law.  

According to whistler-blower Christopher Wylie, up to 7 million votes were affected, (circa 23 percent of vote)

We must not allow our democracy to be compromised. We demand a re-vote. Please sign.
